_changelog: 2025-12-20: Fixed 16 broken URLs based on pipeline_errors.json analysis
- AUVA: Updated M.plus 040.E13 -> E 13 Physische Belastungen
- AUVA: Updated M.plus 800 -> new URL with 2023-04 version
- AUVA: Updated M.plus 910 -> E 14 ABS Gruppe with E 24 EVALOG fallback
- AUVA: Changed M 025, M 841.x, M.plus 841.3, M.plus 842 to publication page URLs (PDFs must be ordered)
- AUVA: Replaced M.plus 340/350/360 with working alternatives
- AUVA: Updated M 719 (was incorrectly labeled as safety shoes, is respiratory filters)
- AUVA: Changed M 846 to publication page with M 845 as fallback
- BAUA: Updated TRBS 2121-1 and 2121-2 URLs to new Teil-1/Teil-2 format
